dialogueLines.line: Hehe! How's that? I hope you had a good time!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...Hmph! That wasn't so bad! Now get the hell out of here!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Do you know where I can find the real couple? I'd love to meet them!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: There's the park where you were first. If you stay there quietly, the couple will eventually come to you. That's the future.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Good idea...I'm getting sleepy...I'll sleep in that park and wait for them.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: (I have a feeling that something will change in me when I meet them...)
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I'm sure this is where my story begins!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily
